dd_node.name: vatp_neg_t
dd_node.trigger_en: The current value has changed from non-0 to 0
dd_node.release_en: The current value has changed from 0 to non-0

dd_node.name: vatp_pos_t
dd_node.trigger_en: The current value has changed from 0 to non-0
dd_node.release_en: The current value has changed from non-0 to 0

dd_node.name: vatp_bit_equ
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前数值指定位==指定值(0/1)
dd_node.trigger_en: Current value of specified bit==specified value(0/1)
dd_node.release_cn: 当前数值指定位!=指定值(0/1)
dd_node.release_en: Current value of specified bit!=specified value(0/1)

dd_node.name: vatp_bit_off_to_on
dd_node.trigger_en: The current value of the specified bit changes from 0 to 1
dd_node.release_en: The current value of the specified bit changes from 1 to 0

dd_node.name: vatp_bit_on_to_off
dd_node.trigger_en: The current value of the specified bit changes from 1 to 0
dd_node.release_en: The current value of the specified bit changes from 0 to 1

dd_node.name: vatp_val_equ
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值>=基准值-触发误差 且 当前值<=基准值+触发误差
dd_node.trigger_en: Current value>=reference value - trigger error, and current value<=reference value+trigger error
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值<基准值-解除误差 或 当前值>基准值+解除误差
dd_node.release_en: Current value<reference value - release error, or current value>reference value+release error

dd_node.name: vatp_val_not_equ
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值<基准值-触发误差 或 当前值>基准值+触发误差
dd_node.trigger_en: Current value<reference value - trigger error, or current value>reference value+trigger error
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值>=基准值-解除误差 且 当前值<=基准值+解除误差
dd_node.release_en: Current value>=reference value - release error, and current value<=reference value+release error

dd_node.name: vatp_val_gt
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值>基准值+触发误差
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值<=基准值+解除误差

dd_node.name: vatp_val_gt_equ
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值>=基准值+触发误差
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值<基准值+解除误差

dd_node.name: vatp_val_lt
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值<基准值+触发误差
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值>=基准值+解除误差

dd_node.name: vatp_val_lt_equ
dd_node.trigger_cn: 当前值<=基准值+触发误差
dd_node.release_cn: 当前值>基准值+解除误差
